t: How to Change Your Brand Name on Amazon in 2025
s: January 23, 2025 - Contrary to popular belief, you can’t simply “rebrand” an existing ASIN on Amazon without creating an entirely new listing. In most circumstances, full rebrands are disallowed—Amazon’s policies are very strict about any changes that fundamentally alter a product’s identity.
